events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but my package still hasn't arrived. The tracking number gives no updates.
The system has categorized the issue under Delivery Delay due to keywords like 'tracking' and 'not arrived'.
Support agent John has been assigned to handle this delivery delay case for further assistance.
Hello! I'm John from customer support. Sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. I'll help you track the shipment.
Could you please provide me with the order number and the tracking number shown on your purchase confirmation email?
Sure, the order number is 987654321 and the tracking number is TRK123456789, but it hasn’t updated in days.
I’ve contacted the shipping company, and they confirmed a delay due to weather. Your package will arrive within 3-5 business days.
Thank you for the update and checking with the shipper. I appreciate the timely response and clarity.
We have resolved your inquiry. Please expect delivery within the next few days. Feel free to reach out if you need further assistance.
Just following up to ensure your delayed package has now arrived and that you are satisfied with the service.
Since you confirmed receipt of the package, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We would appreciate your feedback on our support.
